channel.title: Reviews on Mark Gingrass Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Reviews on Mark Gingrass Blog

item.title: How Green Screens Really Work - The No BS Quick Tutorial
item.description: Green Screens 101 - Fastest Tutorial Review of an affordable green screen that is transportable and sets up quickly. This short 4 minute video is the best way to show how to set up a green screen studio. I will provide the actual links to the products at the end of the review so the page is not cluttered with ads. Watch the video to be convinced how easy this is!

item.title: LimoStudio Green Screen 10Ft Stand Review
item.description: LimoStudio Photo Video Studio 10Ft Adjustable Support System Stand LimoStudio can be found all over thew web showcasing their photo and video products. I chose to purchase their green screen based on the Amazon reviews. A healthy 4 stars with over 3,000 reviews! Check out the video review and recommendation below. Video Review [embed]https://youtu.be/rGr-sME_7_Y[/embed] Setup Whenever you purchase something that requires a setup, you always dred what is to come!

item.title: LimoStudio 9 x 15 ft. Green Chromakey Green Screen
item.description: LimoStudio Chromakey Green Screen Just as I stated with the previous review of the LimoStudio Stand, whenever I make a purchase on Amazon, I look at their rating (how many stars) and the quantity of people who actually did rate them. If the business has a 5 star rating with only six reviews, I keep searching. However, if they have a 4.5 star rating with over 100 reviews, that speaks volumes to me.

item.title: AmazonBasics 60-Inch Lightweight Tripod with Bag Review
item.description: [embed]https://youtu.be/oxOTuqTxO6I[/embed] AmazonBasics 60-Inch Lightweight Tripod with Bag. Amazon’s tripod video review. This tripod will not test the stand of time. The rivets will eventually fall out. It’s still useable but very flimsy. Overall, $21 for a good year and half of use if you are some what careful. If you want something to last years, this is not your tripod.

item.title: SwissGear Travel Gear ScanSmart Backpack 1900 Review Full of Stuff
item.description: SwissGear Travel ScanSmart backpack 1900 Click Play on the Video for a review of this backpack. [embed]https://youtu.be/VTTnRMyFkB8[/embed] I purposely bought the SwissGear Travel ScanSmart backpack 1900 because it can hold two laptops at the same time. I quickly realized that I made the right decision. You can find this on Amazon for about $49-$69 for prime members here. I beat the heck out of this backpack and over stuffed it lots of times.

item.title: Oklahoma City Pizza Reviews - Paseo, Plaza, and Classen Curve
item.description: [embed]https://youtu.be/BdBOOenLd9A?list=PL0oBhq0tLsOBxiq5q__xcWV5WOqS9HGe3[/embed] Quick review of Picasso’s, Sauced, Empire Slice, Hideaway, The Other Room, and Upper Crust all in the Oklahoma City, OK and metro areas. Plaza District, Paseo District, and Classen Curve. I like the pizza places that are not chain restaurants and have a great atmosphere where beer is served and they do not sell cheap beer.
